netgest.bo.xwc.components.classic
Class ColumnAttribute

java.lang.Object
  javax.faces.component.UIComponent
      javax.faces.component.UIComponentBase
          netgest.bo.xwc.framework.components.XUIComponentBase
              netgest.bo.xwc.components.classic.ColumnAttribute
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.faces.component.StateHolder, Column
Direct Known Subclasses:
ColumnAttribute
public class ColumnAttribute
extends XUIComponentBase
implements Column

This component represents a Column in a Grid panel It must reside inside of a Columns element in the viewer

Author:
jcarreira
